pages.text:
Course Details
Course Play Hours:
7 a.m. - Sunset
Pro Shop Hours:
Spring/Summer
(March-August)
During Daylight Saving Time
7 a.m. - 7 p.m.
Fall
(September-October)
During Standard Time
7 a.m. - 6 p.m.
Winter
(November-February)
During Standard Time
7 a.m. - 5 p.m.
(Course and Pro Shop are opened 7 Days a Week, but Closed Christmas Day)
Acquired by the City of Tallahassee in 1981 and re-opened for play in 1982, Hilaman Golf Course has been the City's favorite public golf facility for over three generations. Our par 72 course winds through some of the city's most beautiful landscapes as it challenges golfers of every level. Each of our 18 holes requires a unique approach as you play your way through the course. You are sure to appreciate our wide-open fairways as you tee-off from one of four tee boxes.
Black: yards 6324
Blue: yards 5941
Green: yards 5398
Orange: yards 4551
Upcoming Events and Schedule
There are currently no upcoming events.
Employment Opportunities
Hilaman Golf Course and Jake Gaither Golf Course are looking for enthusiastic team members who have golf experience or want to learn. We offer flexible schedules to work around school.  Weekends and holidays are a must. Learn more and apply for the following available positions:
Hilaman Recreational Aide: Part-Time Temp
Jake Gaither Recreational Aide: Part-Time Temp
Rental Space
Rental space is available.  For more information please call Tom or Justine at 850-688-4403.
2737 Blair Stone Road
• Tallahassee, FL 32301 •
Subscribe
•
Send an email
• (850) 891-2560
